concept.title: Learn
concept.shortdesc: Explore study scenarios and learn new words

conbody.p: In this module, you find sets of flashcards (called scenarios) to learn new vocabulary. The scenarios are grouped by topic; you can also enter keywords in the search box. Scenarios marked with a padlock are only available in the premium version.
The number of words in a scenario varies. You can decide how many words you want to learn in one session. See how to change session settings.

Each flashcard includes:
A word in the language you are learning.
Its translation to your language.
Pronunciation recording.
There are optional actions you can take on a flashcard:
Mark a word as known to exclude it from the tests.
Mark a word as difficult to practice it more frequently.
Each learning session includes vocabulary flashcards and quick quizzes for interactive practice.

The types of quizzes you will encounter:
typing tests
multiple-choice tests
listening skills
tapping test
You can customize your test type preferences. See how to change the settings.
